title: Anyone knows how to fix this?
body: I reinstall the game 10 times already but the game still crash after champion select. When I press reconnect it crashes again. My PBE client works but the normal client just doesnt work lol

replies.body: When you say crash, what do you mean exactly?  What are you seeing after champion select?  If there are error messages, what does it say?  With a little more info, I may be able to help!
